short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment listener viewer for YouTube Live.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract the icon of the user who commented on YouTubeLiveChat.
Avoid duplication of users who have commented many times, and display it as a unique list.
Since it is output to the greenback window, it can be placed on the distribution screen.
It scrolls automatically so you can see all users.
